ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics
Class Cache

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.AModel<AView>
      ca.ualberta.cs.team5geotopics.Cache

public class Cache
extends AModel<AView>

Cache is what is responsible for saving and loading data to and from the user's device. This file is the 'history' of the program.

Method Detail

getCacheIO

public CacheIO getCacheIO()

getInstance

public static Cache getInstance()
Returns the cache singleton. Only one cache object can exist at once. Will construct a new one if one does not currently exist.

Returns:
The cache

loadFileList

public void loadFileList()
Loads the file directory list from disk for the cache.

repliesExist

public boolean repliesExist(java.lang.String filename)
Used to determine if any replies are currently cached at the file location.

Parameters:
filename - The location on disk to search for replies
Returns:
True if replies exist at said location.

loadComment

public CommentModel loadComment(java.lang.String mParentID,
                                java.lang.String EsID)
This will search the cache and return the requested comment. The EsID of the parent is necessary as we catalogue comments based on their parent ID and thus we need this to find the location in the file system to look. Will return null if we cannot find the comment in the cache.

Parameters:
mParent - The EsID of the parent Comment.
EsID - The EsID of the comment we want.
Returns:
The comment we requested from the cache, null if not found.

updateCache

public void updateCache(java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel> updatedList,
                        java.lang.String mParentID)
Updates the cache with a whole list of comments. This update assumes that the list of comments all have the SAME parent and that a version of the list exists in the cache.

Parameters:
updatedList - Updated list of comments

findAndReplace

public void findAndReplace(java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel> commentList,
                           CommentModel comment)
Takes in a list of comments and searches it for a comment withe the same ID in the list. If we find one then we replace the list version with the supplied version. If we do not find it then we add it to the end.

Parameters:
commentList - The list we are searching
comment - Version of the comment we want to replace in the list

updateCache

public void updateCache(CommentModel comment)
Will take a comment and either update a current version of it or add it to the cache.

Parameters:
comment - The comment to add/update in the cache

writeListToCache

public void writeListToCache(java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel> commentList,
                             java.lang.String mParentID)
Takes a list of comment models and determines where to write them to disk (cache). This is determined using the supplied parent ID

Parameters:
commentList - The list to write to the cache
mParentID - The ID of the parent to all the comments in the list

serializeAndWrite

public void serializeAndWrite(java.util.ArrayList<CommentModel> commentList,
                              java.lang.String filename)
This will serialize the array list using JSON then write it to the appropriate place on disk.

Parameters:
commentList - The list to serialise and write to disk
filename - The file to save the list too

loadFromCache

public void loadFromCache(java.lang.String filename,
                          CommentListModel clm)
Loads from the cache at the given filename location. Puts the results into the comment list model supplied.T he file name is the EsID of the parent comment for which you are looking for the list of replies. If we are looking for top levels then supply filename as null.

Parameters:
filename - The location to read.
clm - The comment list model we need to populate.
